title: Crosswinds
description: In a nation caught in the throes of war, Rider Satara Lians fights every day for the safety of her people. But when a leader’s betrayal causes Satara to be accused of treason herself, she is plunged into a desperate quest to clear her name and save her country from imminent defeat. Hunted by those she once called friend and hounded by enemies yet unknown, Satara will either save her people…or prove to be the key to their total destruction.
author: A.E.   Maxwell
